channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pitholes, 6th March
item.description:
The road is dangerous to ride on, partner is a motorbike rider and has nearly fallen many times because you cannot avoid the many potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cranham Lodge, 182 Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: YET another Flytip, 6th March
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the PUBLIC footpath and Old Quarry off the Cleeve Common Road. The fly tip is rubbish and garden waste and has been made just 48 hours after another one had been cleared up! Please can it be cleaned up as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves needing clearance, 6th March
item.description:
Letterbox end of Colesbourne Road Benhall - two piles of leaves - one on each side of the corner of the road - Please could you arrange clearance - many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian Crossing Not Working, 5th March
item.description:
Earlier this week I reported that the audible sounder was not working to Gloucestershire Highways. Yesterday the pedestrian and traffic light signals were also not working. The only functioning part appeared to be the red LED indicators in the motion sensors at the top of the poles. Gloucestershire Highway’s Report It webpage only had the option to ring their emergency number which is only manned on weekdays. The message told me to report it on their website which I can’t!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 The Lea, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner sign fallen down, 5th March
item.description:

item.title: Litter, 5th March
item.description:
Verges covered with litter, also along exit to roundabout to merge with the M5 southbound. Desperately needs a litter pick (as does most A and M roads)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 A417, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet
